name: Extinction (itch) (Yang)
description:
Extinction

The Jam had "BOSS" and "On the Edge" as the theme. Boss meaning in control and On the edge meaning about to fail. You start as one ship on the edge of extinction and work your way up as the leader of your kind.

Diversifiers :

Two Buttons Only : The Game only requires left/ right mouse buttons

Infinity : The Game Never Ends

How To Play

Build different facilities to develop and protect your kind. We will fall if the Mothership is breached.

Made for VimJam2
